mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Goods (goods_id, sub_category_id, goods_title, goods_tags, provider_id, goods_price, goods_banners, goods_desc, goods_markdown_detail, goods_html_detail) VALUES (#{goodsId}, #{subCategoryId}, #{goodsTitle}, #{goodsTags}, #{providerId}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsBanners}, #{goodsDesc}, #{goodsMarkdownDetail}, #{goodsHtmlDetail})
mapper.update: UPDATE Goods SET sub_category_id = #{subCategoryId}, goods_title = #{goodsTitle}, goods_tags = #{goodsTags}, provider_id = #{providerId}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice}, goods_banners = #{goodsBanners}, goods_desc = #{goodsDesc}, goods_markdown_detail = #{goodsMarkdownDetail}, goods_html_detail = #{goodsHtmlDetail} WHERE goods_id = #{goodsId}
